ax.ha.it.smsalarm

Class WakeLocker

  • java.lang.Object
    • ax.ha.it.smsalarm.WakeLocker

  • public abstract class WakeLocker
extends Object
    Class containing static methods to declare and acquire a WakeLock and for releasing it.
    Since:
    2.1
    Version:
    2.1
    Author:
    Robert Nyholm

      static void acquire(Context context)

      • acquireAndRelease

        public static void acquireAndRelease(Context context,
                     int releaseTime)
        To acquire a WakeLock and release it after given time in milliseconds.
        Parameters:
        context - Context to acquire SystemService from
        releaseTime - Time in milliseconds until the acquired WakeLock is released
        See Also:
        acquire(Context), release()
